node.title: Jimmy Kimmel: ‘Aaron Is a Karen’
node.alt: Jimmy Kimmel had some thoughts about Aaron Rodgers, his vaccination status and his hairstyle.
node.description: As Covid sidelined the Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers, Kimmel and other hosts scorned him for implying that he’d been vaccinated.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "The Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers tested positive for Covid this week, which means he\u2019ll sit out Sunday\u2019s game against the Kansas City Chiefs (or as Stephen Colbert put it, \u201cthe next five State Farm commercials\u201d).", "Late-night hosts found it egregious that Rodgers had vaguely referred to himself as \u201cimmunized,\u201d leading some to believe he\u2019d been vaccinated. Instead, according to a report, he received homeopathic treatment.", "On \u201cThe Tonight Show,\u201d Ariana Grande got to see Jimmy Fallon play a clip of her singing the national anthem at eight years old.", "Finally, a world in which Meryl Streep is president \u2014 in Adam McKay\u2019s apocalyptic satire \u201cDon\u2019t Look Up.\u201d"]
